channel.title: Gravitational Wave on Post It!
channel.description: Recent content in Gravitational Wave on Post It!

item.title: GW links
item.description:
List of useful links about gravitational waves:

  • Gravitational waves detector and sources interactive plot
  • Black hole hunter
  • EGO - European Gravitational Observatory
  • VIRGO
  • LIGO - Laser Interferometer Gravitational Wave Observatory
  • eLISA - Evolved Laser Interferometer Space Antenna
  • AURIGA
  • MiniGRAIL - Gravitational Radiation Antenna In Leiden
  • IPTA - International Pulsar Timing Array
  • EPTA - The European Pulsar Timing Array
  • E-Book on gravitational wave detection
  • Games for science teaching, outreach and research
  • Christopher Berry hompage
  • MatchedFiltering ipython notebook with wave amplitude
  • The First Two Years of Electromagnetic Follow-Up with Advanced LIGO and Virgo
